experience.description: •Worked in a team of 20+ people for organizing Prakriti 2022(one of India’s largest Agri-Innovation Fest), which saw the participation of 250+ students from the colleges of Agriculture Science and Allied Sectors.•Responsible for onboarding as well as managing 30+ Campus Ambassadors. Organized an Agri-entrepreneurship competition named Agrivation, as well as a panel discussion with prominent Agri-tech startup founders.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: •Worked on developing software to optimize the bus schedule to prevent bus bunching in a metropolitan city and optimized it to reduce the number of buses and charge stations on board.•Developed an algorithm to efficiently schedule the bus on routes according to the demand.

experience.title: Associate Member
experience.description: -Responsible for conducting Local Startup Meet (LSM) in the Fin-Tech sector which saw the participation of more than 300 startups and prominent venture capitalists, investors, and entrepreneurs.-Been an integral part of the portfolio for Competition and Associations, responsible for signing up a partnership with various Venture Capitalists, incubators, and accelerators throughout the country for our annual business model competition i.e. Empresario.
